document.full_text: depeche mode singer dave gahan, a former heroin addict who cheated death during the 1990s, was honored for his sobriety on friday by a charity that helps musicians who have fallen on hard times.
document.title: depeche mode singer honored at l.a. sobriety event
lines_and_colors: depeche mode singer dave gahan, a former heroin addict who cheated death during the 1990s, was honored for his sobriety on friday by a charity that helps musicians who have fallen on hard times.
